last_episode_to_air.name: David and Goliath
last_episode_to_air.overview: Chip takes on his corporate bosses after being fired trying to get a fired co-worker rehired.

name: Living Biblically
overview: An adaptation of the non-fiction book by A.J. Jacobs, in which a man tries to live in accordance with the Bible's teachings as close as possible.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Chip Curry is a modern day man at a crossroads in his life, who decides to live strictly in accordance with the Bible. A film critic for a New York Newspaper and a soon-to-be father, Chip wants to be a better man following the loss of his best friend.

episodes.name: False Idols
episodes.overview: When Father Gene and Rabbi Gil point out to Chip that his addiction to his smartphone is the same as worshiping a false idol, Chip decides to stop using it, causing his wife, Leslie, and his officemates to worry about his whereabouts.

episodes.name: Love Thy Neighbor
episodes.overview: After several sleepless nights due to loud neighbors, Chip asks Rabbi Gil and Father Gene for advice on loving thy neighbor.

episodes.name: Thou Shalt Not Steal
episodes.overview: Chip infuriates his colleagues when he decides to follow the commandment "Thou Shalt Not Steal" and begins returning office supplies he stole.

episodes.name: Honor Thy Father
episodes.overview: Chip tries to find a loophole to "honoring thy father" when his overbearing dad surprises with a visit.

episodes.name: Thou Shalt Not Bear False Witness
episodes.overview: Chip gets into trouble when he vows to stop lying about anything, regardless of the situation.

episodes.name: Let Us Pray
episodes.overview: Chip's mother-in-law, Diana, a scientist, spars with him about the power of prayer.

episodes.name: Show Hospitality
episodes.overview: Chip and Leslie's patience is tested when they invite Rabbi Gil to stay with them after he discovers his wife is having an affair.

episodes.name: Never Let Loyalty Leave You
episodes.overview: Father Gene is jealous when he finds out that Chip attended Vince's Baptist church to see another side of religion.

episodes.name: Submit to Thy Husband
episodes.overview: When Chip suggests that Leslie quit her job to stay home when the baby is born, she assumes it's his attempt to get her to submit to him based on a bible verse.

episodes.name: Thou Shalt Not Covet
episodes.overview: The "God Squad" warns Chip not to covet a journalism award that he and Vince are both up for.

episodes.name: It's Better to Give Than Receive
episodes.overview: Chip tries to persuade his unenthusiastic officemates to rebuild a house for charity.

episodes.name: David and Goliath
episodes.overview: Chip takes on his corporate bosses after being fired trying to get a fired co-worker rehired.
